CollectionItem Interface Reference

This is the IDL for the Readium interfaces to the SDK, where SDK comprises the functionality implemented to support EPUB 3 rendering not including the application layer. SDK is not intended to indicate a native implementation. More...

import "Readium.idl";

Public Member Functions

integer getChildCount ()
 
Object getChild (integer index)
 
Object getNode ()
 
DOMString getItemName ()
 
Object getAttributes ()
 

Detailed Description

This is the IDL for the Readium interfaces to the SDK, where SDK comprises the functionality implemented to support EPUB 3 rendering not including the application layer. SDK is not intended to indicate a native implementation.

Author
rkwright (8/11/16) - initial draft Provides methods for walking an OPF collection

Definition at line 14 of file Readium.idl.

Member Function Documentation

Object CollectionItem::getAttributes ( )

Returns an array of objects that is the complete set of attributes for this item, where the array is of the form:

[
{ ns:string, name:string, value:string },
{ ns:string, name:string, value:string },
{ ns:string, name:string, value:string }
etc.
]

where
ns is the fully qualified namespace
name is the short name of the attribute (without prefix or namespace)
value is the value of the attribute

Returns
an array of objects that hold the complete set of attributes
Object CollectionItem::getChild ( integer  index)

Fetch the specified child of the current CollectionItem Returns null if there isn't one

Parameters
index0-based index of the item to fetch
Returns
object that implements the the CollectionItem interface
integer CollectionItem::getChildCount ( )

Return the number of children of this CollectionItem

Returns
integer
DOMString CollectionItem::getItemName ( )

Get the short name of the element that the CollectionItem wraps

Returns
string that is the name of the item's element
Object CollectionItem::getNode ( )

Retrieve the actual DOM node wrapped by this item

Returns
the actual DOM node wrapped by this item
